caption.p: Megaselia scalaris specimens caught in S. frugiperda containers ( A), S. frugiperda specimens with several eggs of M. scalaris ( B– D), M. scalaris larvae emerging from the S. frugiperda pupa ( E), and the medium for S. frugiperda intestinal fungi isolation ( F). ( A– E) were from Yunnan, and ( F) originated in Chongqing. Red arrows indicate the eggs of M. scalaris, red triangles indicate the M. scalaris larvae.
